info.name: Movie API Documentation
info.description:
\# ðŸŽ¬ Movie Management REST API

\## Overview  
A RESTful API for managing a movie collection. Built with Spring Boot.

\## Base URL

[http://localhost:8080/api/movies](http://localhost:8080/api/movies)

StartFragment

```
## Authentication
No authentication required (public API)
## Content Type
All requests use `application/json`
## Response Codes
| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 200 | Success |
| 201 | Created |
| 400 | Bad Request (validation error) |
| 404 | Not Found |
| 500 | Server Error |

 ```

EndFragment

[](https://postman.postman.co/documentation/24552533-5bead607-0197-4e1d-87d4-3160bc7631c1?entity=&branch=&version=)

response.name: GetAllMovies
response.body:
## Get All Movies

Retrieves a list of all movies in the database.

### Request
- **Method:** GET
- **URL:** `/api/movies`
- **Body:** None required

### Response
Returns an array of movie objects.

### Example Response
```json
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "title": "Inception",
    "description": "A thief who enters the dreams of others",
    "genre": "Sci-Fi",
    "releaseYear": 2010,
    "rating": 8.8,
    "director": "Christopher Nolan",
    "durationMinutes": 148
  }
]

Status Codes
Code	Description
200	Success - Returns movie list
500	Server Error

response.name: GetMoviesByID
response.body:
# Get Movie by ID

Retrieves a single movie by its unique ID.

### Request
- **Method:** GET
- **URL:** `/api/movies/{id}`

### Path Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | Long | Yes | Unique movie identifier |

### Example Request
GET /api/movies/1


### Success Response (200 OK)
```json
{
  "id": 1,
  "title": "Inception",
  "description": "A thief who enters the dreams of others",
  "genre": "Sci-Fi",
  "releaseYear": 2010,
  "rating": 8.8,
  "director": "Christopher Nolan",
  "durationMinutes": 148
}

Error Response (404 Not Found)

{
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:30:00",
  "status": 404,
  "error": "Not Found",
  "message": "Movie not found with ID: 999"
}


Status Codes
Code	Description
200	Success - Returns movie
404	Movie not found
500	Server Error

body.raw:
{
  "title": "The Matrix",
  "description": "A computer hacker learns about reality",
  "genre": "Sci-Fi",
  "releaseYear": 1999,
  "rating": 8.7,
  "director": "The Wachowskis",
  "durationMinutes": 136

response.body:
## Create Movie

Creates a new movie in the database.

### Request
- **Method:** POST
- **URL:** `/api/movies`
- **Content-Type:** application/json

### Request Body

| Field | Type | Required | Description | Constraints |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|-------------|
| title | String | Yes | Movie title | 1-200 characters |
| description | String | Yes | Movie synopsis | Max 2000 characters |
| genre | String | Yes | Movie genre | - |
| releaseYear | Integer | Yes | Year of release | 1888-2035 |
| rating | Double | No | Movie rating | 0-10 |
| director | String | Yes | Director name | - |
| durationMinutes | Integer | No | Duration in minutes | Min 1 |

### Example Request Body
```json
{
  "title": "The Matrix",
  "description": "A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality",
  "genre": "Sci-Fi",
  "releaseYear": 1999,
  "rating": 8.7,
  "director": "The Wachowskis",
  "durationMinutes": 136
}


Success Response (201 Created)

{
  "id": 4,
  "title": "The Matrix",
  "description": "A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality",
  "genre": "Sci-Fi",
  "releaseYear": 1999,
  "rating": 8.7,
  "director": "The Wachowskis",
  "durationMinutes": 136
}


Validation Error Response (400 Bad Request)

{
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:30:00",
  "status": 400,
  "error": "Validation Failed",
  "message": "Invalid input data. Please check the errors.",
  "errors": {
    "title": "Movie title is required",
    "releaseYear": "Release year is required"
  }
}

Status Codes
Code	Description
201	Created - Movie added successfully
400	Bad Request - Validation failed
500	Server Error

response.name: GetMoviesBYGenre
response.body:
## Get Movies by Genre

Retrieves all movies of a specific genre.

### Request
- **Method:** GET
- **URL:** `/api/movies/genre/{genre}`

### Path Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| genre | String | Yes | Genre to filter by |

### Available Genres
- Action
- Comedy
- Drama
- Sci-Fi
- Horror
- Romance
- Thriller

### Example Request

GET /api/movies/genre/Sci-Fi


### Success Response (200 OK)
```json
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "title": "Inception",
    "genre": "Sci-Fi",
    ...
  },
  {
    "id": 3,
    "title": "The Matrix",
    "genre": "Sci-Fi",
    ...
  }
]

Status Codes
Code	Description
200	Success - Returns matching movies
500	Server Error

response.name: GetMoviesCount
response.body:
## Get Movie Count

Returns the total number of movies in the database.

### Request
- **Method:** GET
- **URL:** `/api/movies/count`

### Success Response (200 OK)
```json
{
  "count": 5
}

Status Codes
Code	Description
200	Success - Returns count
500	Server Error
